p: All participants will be recruited from the Oncology Department of Chengdu Second People's Hospital, a tertiary hospital, which plays the leading role at the local. We will recruit cases diagnosed with magnificent tumor confirmed by clinicopathology or cytology undergoing the cisplatin-based chemotherapy regimens. Participants who fulfil the inclusion criteria and sign informed consent forms will enter the screening period, otherwise will be excluded before randomization. Chengdu is the largest base of industrial technology and commercial and financial center in the west of China, with a population of 14,047,600, where could collect more cases of diversity. The duration of enrollment is from December 31, 2020 to December 30, 2022.
